Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetChangeContractHoldersFunds.label: Net Change Contract Holders Funds
NetChangeContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash inflow or outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Effect of Adoption, Quantification (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.description: Represents the quantification of the effect of adopting the new accounting standard or change in accounting principle expected by the entity to have a significant effect on the entity's financial statements.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableForSale.description: Gross appreciation or the gross loss in value of the total unsold securities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Reclassifications, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.description: Amount, before tax, after reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossPensionAndOt.description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income of defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized (losses) realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized (losses) realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized (losses) realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Write-down of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Write-down of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Write-down of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized loss realized upon the write-down of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Transition Asset (Obligation), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for transition asset (obligation) of defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Transition Asset (Obligation), Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Net of tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for the net transition (asset) obligation recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherPolicyholderFunds.label: Other Policyholder Funds
OtherPolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, Additional Credit Losses
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, No Previous Impairment
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Cash Flows
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held due to increases in cash flows expected to be collected and recognized over the remaining life of the security.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Change in Status
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the amount of cumulative losses recognized in earnings for other than temporary impairments (OTTI) for which a portion of the impairment had been recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity) due to a change in status of the impaired security because of a change in the entity's intent to either sell the impaired security or it has become more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the security before recovery of its cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Reductions, Securities Sold
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents reductions in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security because of the sale of impaired securities during the period.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount after tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.label: Participating Insurance, Percentage of Gross Insurance in Force
ParticipatingPoliciesAsPercentageOfGross.description: Percentage of participating insurance contract to insurance contracts in force.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Productive Assets
PaymentsForProceedsFromProductiveAssets.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from purchases, sales and disposals of property, plant and equipment and other productive assets, including intangibles.

PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Short-term Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromShortTermInvestme.description: The net amount paid (received) by the reporting entity through acquisition or sale and maturities of short-term investments with an original maturity that is three months or less which qualify for treatment as an investing activity based on management's intention and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities, because they are not classified as trading securities.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage Notes Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageNotesReceivable.description: The cash outflow from the purchase of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Other Investments
PaymentsToAcquireOtherInvestments.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateHeldForInvest.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans.label: Payments to Fund Policy Loans
PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans.description: The initial funding or additional funding of loans receivable to policy holders principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderContractDeposits.label: Policyholder Contract Deposit
PolicyholderContractDeposits.description: Amount of liability due to policyholder for deposit held under long-duration contract issued by insurance entity.

PremiumsEarnedNet.label: Premiums Earned, Net
PremiumsEarnedNet.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of premiums earned.

PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce.label: Premiums, Net, Life Insurance in Force (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life insurance in force premiums.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfits.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the present value of the future profits asset (also known as value of business acquired).

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: The amount of the present value of future profits asset that was amortized during the period, generally in proportion to related revenue earned, estimated gross profits, or over the customer relationship or some other period.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Amortization Expense
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsAmor.description: Amount of amortization expense (reversal of expense) for present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Interest Accrued (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.description: Amount of long-term market rate of interest earned on present value of future insurance profits during the reporting period.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Interest Accrued (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsInte.description: Amount of interest earned on present value of future insurance profits.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Investment Gains (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.description: Amount of the increase in the period in the present value of future profits asset attributable to unrealized investment gains.

PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Unrealized Investment Gain
PresentValueOfFutureInsuranceProfitsUnre.description: Amount of unrealized investment gain which decreases present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfPolicyLoans.label: Proceeds from Collection of Policy Loans
ProceedsFromCollectionOfPolicyLoans.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of policy loans receivable.

ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Proceeds from Life Insurance Policy
ProceedsFromLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Mortgage Notes Receivable
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfMortgageN.description: The cash inflow from proceeds from sale of receivables arising from the mortgage note on real estate; includes collections on mortgage notes receivable that are not classified as operating cash flows.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities, Equity
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

QuarterlyFinancialInformationQuarterlyCh.label: Quarterly Financial Information, Quarterly Charges and Credits, Amount Reconciling to Previously Reported Results (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
QuarterlyFinancialInformationQuarterlyCh.description: Amount by which previously reported quarterly results were revised (for example, to correct an error, or to give retrospective effect to a change in an accounting principle).

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

RealEstateInvestmentsJointVentures.label: Real Estate Investments, Joint Ventures
RealEstateInvestmentsJointVentures.description: The book value of investments in real estate joint ventures including direct and indirect investments.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, Net of Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecovera.label: Reinsurance Receivables (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecovera.description: Amount after valuation allowance currently billed or billable under reinsurance contracts.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Share-based Liabilities Paid
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of cash paid to settle liability for award under share-based payment arrangement.

SignificantChangeInUnrecognizedTaxBenefi.label: Significant Change in Unrecognized Tax Benefits is Reasonably Possible, Amount of Unrecorded Benefit
SignificantChangeInUnrecognizedTaxBenefi.description: The amount of the unrecognized tax benefit of a position taken for which it is reasonably possible that the total amount thereof will significantly increase or decrease within twelve months of the balance sheet date.

SignificantPurchaseCommitmentRemainingMi.label: Purchase Commitment, Remaining Minimum Amount Committed (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
SignificantPurchaseCommitmentRemainingMi.description: The floor amount as of the balance sheet date that the entity must expend to satisfy the terms of disclosed arrangements (excluding long-term commitments) in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services from one or more suppliers, other than under a long-term purchase commitment or an unconditional purchase obligation.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Amount
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Amount of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.label: SEC Schedule, 12-15, Insurance Companies, Summary of Investments, Other than Investments in Related Parties, Cost
SummaryOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestments.description: Cost of investment held by insurance company, excluding investment in related party.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Amortization of Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationAmortiz.description: Amount of amortization of deferred policy acquisition cost recognized, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Benefit, Claim, Loss and Settlement Expenses
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationBenefit.description: Amount of insurance benefit, claim, loss and settlement expenses incurred, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Deferred Policy Acquisition Cost
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationDeferre.description: Amount of deferred policy acquisition cost capitalized on contract remaining in force, as disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Liability for Future Policy Benefit, Loss, Claim and Loss Expense
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationLiabili.description: Amount of reserve for future policy claim payable and loss expense to be incurred, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Net Investment Income
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationNetInve.description: Amount of net investment income earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Premium Revenue
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationPremium.description: Amount of premium revenue earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Unearned Premium
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationUnearne.description: Amount of premium not yet earned, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets and Liabilities, Net (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The net carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets and liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.label: Withdrawal from Contract Holders Funds
WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.
